events.text: Ahhh, finally you've arrived!!!! I'll tell you what the product model is about
The product model is a modern software development tool. The model enables operational agility, which allows organizations to react at startup speed.
In the product model, autonomous teams develop capabilities focused on achieving business outcomes by acting directly on user feedback to rapidly deploy and deliver value.
The Product Model has 9 dimensions split into 4 increasingly maturity levels as part of the transformation journey.
After teaching the product model, we will evaluate you according to POMA (Product Operation Maturity Assessment).
Get in the elevator and go to the first floor to learn about the first dimension: [color=#00FF00]Vision[/color]
